Interactive Simply Logical textbook

Posted on October 14, 2015

Online edition of “Simply Logical: Intelligent Reasoning by Example” is live. Furthermore, you don’t have to install SWI-Prolog locally on your machine to enjoy the code examples. The online edition has been enhanced with interactive Prolog code blocks, based on SWISH, so you can execute them directly in your web browser.

Now there is no excuse to get down to some Prolog!
